column4: Hey guys, I had a quick question about iptables /linux firewalls. I have disabled iptables by allowing all traffic through. I was just wondering why is it that port is still not being open?
I've tried using netcat and listening on the port but even then it didn't take.
so you have no firewall and all ports are open listening and you want what??? a honeypot?
no I'm just trying to allow connections to a single port
